CustomField.formula: "The Loan Document can not be generated.\\nPlease review the following fields and then click the [ButtonName] button again:" &IF(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Loan__c,""), "\\nType of Loan","") &IF(ISPICKVAL(Account.ProvinceResidency__c,""),"\\nProvince of Residency","") &IF(ISBLANK(Name),"\\nOpportunity Name","") &IF(ISBLANK(Amount),"\\nLoan Amount","") &IF(ISBLANK(APR_1__c),"\\nAPR 1","") &IF(ISBLANK(APR_2__c),"\\nAPR 2","") &IF(ISBLANK(Style_of_Cause_Description__c),"\\nStyle of Cause Description","") &IF(ISBLANK(Name_of_Court__c),"\\nName of Court","") &IF(ISBLANK(Court_File_No__c),"\\nCourt File No","") &IF(ISBLANK(Admin_Fee__c),"\\nAdmin Fee","") &IF(ISBLANK(Law_Firm__c),"\\nLaw Firm","") &IF(ISBLANK(Lawyer__c),"\\nLawyer","") &IF(ISBLANK(Lawyer_Email__c),"\\nLawyer e-Mail Address","") &IF(ISBLANK(Attorney_Full_Address__c),"\\nLawyer Full Address","") &IF(ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__c),"\\nPrimary Contact","") &IF(ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Email__c),"\\nPrimary Contact e-Mail Address","") &IF(ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Street__c)||ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_City__c)||ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Province__c)||ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Postal_Code__c),"\\nPrimary Contact Address","") &IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Loan__c,"Lump-Sum"), ISBLANK(Loan_Amt_minus_Admin_Fee__c)),"\\nFirst Draw Amount","") &IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Loan__c,"Facility Loan"),OR(ISBLANK(First_Drawdown_Amount__c),ISBLANK(Amount_Paid_to_Borrower__c))),"Amount Paid to Borrower","") &IF(ISBLANK( Scenario__c ),"\\nProvince of Residency and Type of Loan do not match a valid document","")
CustomField.label: Conga Doc Error
